item.title: LocalStack with AWS S3
item.description: DISCLAIMER: Image is generated using Leonardo AI. 1. Introduction 2. Setup awscli 3. Setup LocalStack 4. Make Bucket 5. List Buckets 6. Upload File 7. List Bucket 8. Download File 9. Delete File 10. Remove Bucket 11. S3 with Python 12. S3 with Perl 13. What next? Introduction Recently I got the opportunity to work with AWS S3 at work. For this I wanted to brush up my knowledge as last I played with it was an year ago.
